title: Foy Yin Vegetarian Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Singaporean
description: 佛音素食 is a stall located in the Foodmaster food court on the 2nd floor of The Aperia. Opened Jan 2015. Serves ready-cooked dishes to be eaten with rice or bee hoon. On the menu are fried rice, hor fun, curry  noodles, laksa, local tze char dishes.
